fields_of_interest: Taxation, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
Capital Markets Union Package (in particular the initiative on Crowdfunding ECSP and Financial Technology (FinTech)) 
Digital Single Market Initiatives 
Prospectus Directive 
Data Privacy Directive 
Payment Services Directive
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Member of the Board of the European Crowdfunding Network (ECN) - Vice chair Lending
goals__remit: Lendix (lendix.com) is continental Europe’s leading lending platform for small businesses, allowing its community of retail (over 30,000) and institutional investors to finance businesses who want to grow in Europe. Since launching in 2014, Lendix has lent more than €160M to more than 400 businesses globally.
